be059492-e66b-48a0-9d87-e0f35fec76ec.description: The CMA® is the globally recognized, advanced-level professional certification for accountants and financial professionals in business. Achieving the CMA demonstrates expertise in financial planning, analysis, control, decision support, and professional ethics – skills that are in high demand on finance teams around the world.
be059492-e66b-48a0-9d87-e0f35fec76ec.name: Certified Management Accountant

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the CMA exams
Have two continuous years of professional experience in management accounting or financial management
Hold a bachelor’s degree from an accredited college/university or a related professional certification
Maintain membership in IMA
Abide by the IMA’s Statement of Ethical Professional Practice
30 hours of continuing professional education are required annually to maintain CMA credential

e6e3444f-fd58-48a9-a147-23043cb29325.description: Learn how the power of data can be harnessed to gain deeper insight into business performance and to make informed strategic decisions. This online course offers hands-on, experiential learning through case scenarios and practical exercises. The content is based on IMA’s thought leadership found in its various research and publications. You’ll hear straight from industry experts who share their proficiency and perspectives on emerging technologies, data analytics, and data visualization.
e6e3444f-fd58-48a9-a147-23043cb29325.name: IMA Data Analytics & Visualization Fundamentals Certificate®

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the IMA Data Analytics & Visualization Fundamentals Certificate®.

skills.name: Decision Analysis Or Strategic Decision Making

369cb76c-5d44-4592-9b32-4b89b8383fde.description: The IMA Leadership Academy (IMALA) supports the development and enhancement of our members’ leadership education and skills to aid in career advancement.
369cb76c-5d44-4592-9b32-4b89b8383fde.name: Leadership Silver Level

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Completed nine leadership courses
Completed three years as a faculty member of IMALA
Served as a chapter officer in a position other than president
Served as a council officer for three years in a position other than president
Served one term as an advisory committee member
Served as a global advisory committee chair for one term
Made a one-time donation of $500 to IMA

44ddf845-804d-4ad7-99b2-740b26e63722.description: The IMA Leadership Academy (IMALA) supports the development and enhancement of our members’ leadership education and skills to aid in career advancement.

badge_template_activities.title: Completed six IMALA courses

ae6922d2-2469-48ef-a234-d13b0e5d853a.description: The IMA Leadership Academy (IMALA) supports the development and enhancement of our members’ leadership education and skills to aid in career advancement.
ae6922d2-2469-48ef-a234-d13b0e5d853a.name: Leadership Gold Level

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Completed 15 IMALA courses

9493c370-0cf5-4e22-ac5e-499d4afa2f68.description: The IMA Leadership Academy (IMALA) supports the development and enhancement of our members’ leadership education and skills to aid in career advancement.

36f4ec50-e6a0-46f2-9522-e6030d7eb671.description: The IMA Accounting Honor Society (IAHS) recognizes and honors academic achievement in the study of accounting and provides an opportunity for students to differentiate themselves as they begin their career journey. IAHS membership is available to all students who meet the eligibility criteria.
36f4ec50-e6a0-46f2-9522-e6030d7eb671.name: IMA Accounting Honor Society

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Attend an accredited college or university in the U.S
Be a declared Accounting, Finance, or IT major
Have taken a minimum of three accounting courses (this can include the principles courses)
Be the junior year or later in an undergraduate program or enrolled in a graduate or Ph.D. program
Have an overall and accounting GPA of 3.0 or above

9a256838-e16f-4772-b60c-d593149cb97a.description: The CFM® is a professional certification for accountants and financial professionals in business. Achieving the CFM demonstrates expertise in financial management and professional ethics. (Note: the CFM exam is no longer offered, but IMA still maintains the credential for those who are certified as CFMs.)
9a256838-e16f-4772-b60c-d593149cb97a.name: Certified in Financial Management

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the CFM exam
Have two continuous years of professional experience in management accounting or financial management
Hold a bachelor’s degree from an accredited college/university
Maintain membership in IMA
Abide by the IMA’s Statement of Ethical Professional Practice
30 hours of continuing professional education are required annually to maintain CFM credential

b83e884b-5506-4ca2-94f2-dd5d9a165b2a.description: The IMA Leadership Academy (IMALA) supports the development and enhancement of our members’ leadership education and skills to aid in career advancement.
b83e884b-5506-4ca2-94f2-dd5d9a165b2a.name: Leadership Platinum Level

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Served as an IMALA faculty member and presented or moderated nine courses
Served as a chapter or council officer for four or more years
Served as an advisory committee member for three or more terms
Served as an advisory committee chair for one term
Served as a Global Director on IMA's Global Board of Directors for three or more terms
Completed highest levels of service

782d1f8d-6050-49ca-9304-5c31cfac7621.description: The CSCA is a specialty accounting and finance certification that helps professionals master the concepts and techniques required to be key players in driving strategic planning at their organizations. Prior to pursuing the CSCA certification, candidates must first possess a CMA or other approved accounting or finance certification.
782d1f8d-6050-49ca-9304-5c31cfac7621.name: Certified in Strategy and Competitive Analysis

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Candidates must first possess a CMA or other approved accounting or finance certification.
Passing the CSCA examination

022eb57f-d505-476e-9962-b8c9403b5c3f.description: IMA's RPA Series is a package of four (4) individual courses relating to various aspects of robotic process automation (RPA). Learn the basic terminology and functionality of RPA, what risks to be aware of and how to mitigate them, the financial and nonfinancial benefits of automation, and the role you can take in implementing RPA. Each course focuses on one element of RPA to provide a step-by-step and holistic perspective on what it takes to bring RPA to your organization.
022eb57f-d505-476e-9962-b8c9403b5c3f.name: IMA's RPA Series

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of IMA's RPA Series

f5b02c9e-a98a-40eb-be3a-8d84778bb30a.description: The IMA Financial Planning & Analysis Certificate™ explores the topic of financial planning and analysis from a budgeting, planning, and forecasting perspective. This three-part e-learning certificate uses hypothetical case studies and real-life examples to help you align your company's strategy across the organization and drive its overall performance. Competency Domain supported: Strategy, Planning & Performance.
f5b02c9e-a98a-40eb-be3a-8d84778bb30a.name: IMA Financial Planning & Analysis Certificate™

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: The three courses included in the certificate are: Course 1: Strategic Budgeting, Course 2: Strategic Planning, and Course 3: Forecasting Techniques

4e317e25-c7c8-48cd-a6f9-5d5f8c173012.description: The Institute of Management Accountants (IMA), American Institute of CPAs (AICPA), American Accounting Association (AAA), Financial Executives International (FEI), and Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA) comprise the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO). The committee is dedicated to providing thought leadership through the development of frameworks and guidance on enterprise risk management, internal control, and fraud deterrence.
4e317e25-c7c8-48cd-a6f9-5d5f8c173012.name: COSO Internal Control

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed extensive coursework regarding the COSO Internal Control-Integrated Framework.
Passed the COSO Internal Control Final Assessment Exam.

3b1c480b-81bc-4b6c-8016-1519e886cc8c.description: IMA® (Institute of Management Accountants) is proud to recognize the recipient of this badge for outstanding service to their campus community. IMA Ambassadors demonstrate leadership and entrepreneurial skills by supporting future accounting and finance professionals as well as educating their student peers and academic faculty about IMA resources and the CMA® (Certified Management Accountant) exam.
3b1c480b-81bc-4b6c-8016-1519e886cc8c.name: IMA® Student Ambassador

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Create and engage a network of peers and faculty to raise awareness of IMA student and academic resources.
Host informative campus events featuring accomplished accounting and finance professionals from a broad range of industries.
Lead information sessions on the benefits of the CMA program.
Motivate students and faculty to participate in valuable IMA programs and events.

24b47e25-4829-4a1d-bb0b-fc2d473dcdfc.description: The Institute of Management Accountants (IMA), American Institute of CPAs (AICPA), American Accounting Association (AAA), Financial Executives International (FEI), and Institute of Internal Auditors (IIA) comprise the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (COSO). The committee is dedicated to providing thought leadership through the development of frameworks and guidance on enterprise risk management, internal control, and fraud deterrence.
24b47e25-4829-4a1d-bb0b-fc2d473dcdfc.name: COSO Enterprise Risk Management

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully completed extensive coursework regarding the COSO Enterprise Risk Management – Integrating with Strategy and Performance.
Passed the COSO ERM Final Assessment Exam.

c6900db3-9025-4dbe-a30e-73d2c8f14051.description: Learn the education needed to navigate the developing complexities of the management accounting role in sustainable business practices. The courses in this certificate program cover topics including the demystification of environmental, social, and governance (ESG) matters; partnering for the integration of sustainability in business; and strategies, planning, performance, monitoring, and reporting in a sustainable business environment.
c6900db3-9025-4dbe-a30e-73d2c8f14051.name: IMA Sustainability Business Practices Certificate™

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of the courses and cumulative final exam of the IMA Sustainability Business Practices Certificate™ program.

skills.name: Decision Analysis Or Strategic Decision Making

d6f2abf2-2786-4f41-9ce5-1d3a78c4a7ba.description: Learn effective practices to foster a diverse, equitable, and inclusive environment. This self-study certificate program features interactive exercises that demystify diversity, equity, and inclusion (DE&I), reveal the overlap between DE&I and sustainability, and illustrate the professional accountant’s ethical imperative to champion DE&I initiatives. The content is based on IMA’s thought leadership and research publications, boasting many actionable practices to establish a sense of belonging,
d6f2abf2-2786-4f41-9ce5-1d3a78c4a7ba.name: IMA Diversity, Equity & Inclusion Practices Certificate™

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

33b6f733-e9bb-4d91-bc62-e4bd8d2d7bc0.description: The purpose of the Society is to offer IMA Leaders a welcoming community where they can continue their service to IMA and expand their professional and leadership skills. SCMS provides educational programs for students and professionals, student scholarships, networking opportunities and a diverse and inclusive forum to continue their camaraderie.
33b6f733-e9bb-4d91-bc62-e4bd8d2d7bc0.name: IMA Stuart Cameron McLeod Society Member

issuer.summary: issued by IMA | Institute of Management Accountants

badge_template_activities.title: Be an IMA member in good standing
Have documented volunteer service within IMA for no less than one year
Have an interest in advancing the profession of accounting, finance, or information management
